suggest.amasty/module-gift-card-graph-ql: We recommend to install Gift Card GraphQL module if you use Magento 2.3.3+.
suggest.amasty/module-gift-card-mftf-2: Install module-gift-card-mftf-2 module to be able to run Gift Card MFTF tests for Magento 2.3.6+ version.
suggest.amasty/module-gift-card-mftf-3: Install module-gift-card-mftf-3 module to be able to run Gift Card MFTF tests for Magento 2.4.1+ version.
